name: Blue Dream
description: A classic, widely recognized strain with a bright aroma and a balanced profile many shoppers enjoy exploring.

name: Wedding Cake
description: A dessert-leaning cultivar with a rich, layered aroma that’s often described as sweet and peppery.

name: Gelato
genetics: Sunset Sherbet x Thin Mint GSC
description: Gelato-style genetics are known for smooth, dessert-forward aroma notes and a well-rounded experience.

name: Sour Diesel
description: A well-known, fuel-forward profile with sharp citrus notes that many shoppers recognize instantly.

name: OG Kush
description: An iconic cultivar often associated with bold aroma and classic ‘OG’ character—earthy, piney, and gassy.
